description:
"Great Mentor, and also the good method of teaching. I am a 16+ kid from India and I was looking for the way that could help me get some basic awareness about starting a business and the responsibilities of an entrepreneur. Got some extra info regarding marketings and steps to follow to reach out the correct audience. What to do and what not and even got to know more about the personal point of views from a bunch of successful persons. Overall: A quick course and very helpful for getting the rough ideas and guideline for becoming an entrepreneur."

"Good information and very motivational. Once I started I couldn't stop till I watched all of them."

  • 5000 + students
  • 150 reviews with an average of 4.4/5
  • Business podcast 'Breaking Biz' with over 10,000 subscribers


This course is designed to simplify the best practices of entrepreneurship so you can understand the small steps to take to turn your dreams into business reality.

Understand the art of productivity, time management and original thinking!

  • Discover the basics of idea generation
  • Learn how to properly manage your time to be more effective
  • Hear how multi millionairre Steve Parish started his career of success
  • Understand the essentials of content marketing

Hear from some of today's most successful entrepreneurs!

In the course you will learn how to avoid 'fishing' for your customers and instead, create targeted and relevant ads. There are productivity hacks and simple rules for success. You'll even benefit from a number of real life multi millionairres who share their best practices for being an entrepreneur.

From understanding the basics, through to learning simple techniques, you will leave this course ready to embark on your own small business adventure.

I designed this course to offer you an easy to follow, comprehensive guide to becoming an entrepreneur. Entrepreneurship is a topic that can be made complicated very quickly. This is why I have prepared slide presentations with a running commentary, so you can enjoy the visuals and explanations that go with them.

I hope you enjoy learning the basics, and I look forward to connecting with students who have any requirements or questions.
title: The Simple Guide To Becoming An Entrepreneur
